channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks on Becky's Curriculum Vitae
channel.description: Recent content in Recent & Upcoming Talks on Becky's Curriculum Vitae

item.title: Discourse function of marked and unmarked verbs in u̱t-Ma'in narrative
item.description: Citeable as Paterson, Rebecca Dow Smith. 2013. Discourse function of marked and unmarked verbs in u̱t-Ma’in narrative. Presentation at the workshop on “Aspect and Discourse in African Languages” at the 46th Annual Meeting of the Societas Linguistica Europaea, Split University Croatia.

item.title: The noun class system of u̱t-Ma'in, a West Kainji language of Northwestern Nigeria
item.description: Citeable as: Smith, Rebecca Dow. 2007. The noun class system of u̱t-Ma’in, a West Kainji language of Northwestern Nigeria. M.A. Thesis defense at the University of North Dakota.

item.title: Research on u̱t-Ma'in noun classes
item.description: Citeable as Smith, Rebecca Dow. 2007. Research on u̱t-Ma’in noun classes. Presentation at Jos Linguistic Circle, Jos, Nigeria.

item.title: Nominalization in u̱t-Ma'in
item.description: Citeable as Smith, Rebecca Dow. 2006. Nominalization in u̱t-Ma’in. Presentation at Linguistics Seminar, Jos, Nigeria.
